snippet: The suspects, while trying to make an arrest, ran away when questioned by Queens narcotic officers.
abstract: Narcotics officers in College Point, Queens, stop to assist an apparent arrest in progress that turns out to be two men impersonating police officers; both men escape but subject of their attention is arrested when marijuana is found in his car.
lead_paragraph: The suspects, while trying to make an arrest, ran away when questioned by Queens narcotic officers.

headline.main: Pulled Over and Handcuffed by 2 Posing as Officers
headline.print_headline:
Pulled Over
And Cuffed
By 2 Posing
As Officers
